title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-2.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1626-2.1 - General

State Regulations

The authority should make every effort to relocate site
and offsite tenants as quickly as possible so that buildings may be vacated and
demolished. Section
153
of the

Public Housing Law outlines steps an authority may take to assist low income
families being displaced by the project development. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1626-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
